title: What are common use cases of artificial intelligence in web applications? - Quora

response.answer_text: Common uses of AI in web applications are artificial agent online help services via an AI based software bot, automatic language translation in special use arenas (i.e. airline reservation systems, business communications, international airline notification systems that tell passengers about flight information, international railway notification systems that tell passengers about train information and speech recognition and speech simulation based applications on networks of computers used in the business environment). The fore-mentioned examples are but only a few uses of AI in web based applications). Robotronics LLC | Facebook
Google applications. Might sound too common but it is the fact. Go to Research at Google and check out more. Sheets,photos,maps,docs,drive,mail,contacts,now and even the decade old search use AI.
